attributes.action: Reconsider the Registration fees for nurses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When nurses became qualified in the 80's and earlier, they had to pay one weeks wages to register as a nurse for life. The body was taken over, and now the fees are every three years, with talk of them rising. This does not seem fair, as this generation of nurses have already paid their registration fees.
